name: Octo-Nuke
description:
UPDATE: BUG FIXED - COPIES 30 NOT SHOWN AFTER RETURNING TO THE OFFICE.

You are looking for a job and get hired rather easily as a Financial Analyst over at Ultimate Financial Consulting.

Start work by filing documents, making copies and answering phone calls. Typical, ain't it?!

After your first day of work, you receive troubling news and you decide to play hero.

GO! SAVE THE WORLD!

NOTE: SAVING IS DISABLED FOR NOW. PLEASE PLAY THE GAME THROUGH ONE SITTING. THANKS.
